ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish like to swim in me. What am I?
I make a 'whoosh' sound when I come to the shore. What am I?
I have a hard shell and live in the sea. I walk sideways. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I sometimes hide in my shell
🚶 I move in a funny way

ocean.question: I am small and you can find me on the beach. I am made of sand, and sometimes, sea creatures live in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 Some small animals live in me.

ocean.question: I have a pointy head, and can jump out of the water and swim fast. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I like to play near boats.

ocean.question: I am flat and live on the bottom of the ocean. I look like a star. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I have arms, but I'm not a person.
🌟 I am shaped like a star.

ocean.question: I'm a big creature, living in the water, with pointy teeth and like to swim very fast. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I have a fin on my back

ocean.question: I am very big and slow, and I swim in the ocean. I have a hard shell on my back. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I lay eggs in the sand.

ocean.question: I live in the ocean, and can be a lot of colors, I have arms that can sting if you touch them. What am I?

hints.text: 🟣 I can be purple, blue, or pink
🐠 Small fish live near me for protection

ocean.question: I am a very big animal who lives in the ocean. I sing songs and have a big tail, what am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am the largest animal on Earth.
💨 I breathe air through a hole on my back.
🎵 I make loud noises under water.

animal.question: I say 'Meow!' and love to play with yarn. What am I?

hints.text: 🐈‍⬛ I have soft fur and whiskers.

animal.question: I go 'Woof woof!' and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🐕 I'm a good friend and companion.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am often yellow when I'm little.

animal.question: I oink and roll in the mud. What am I?
I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat grass in the field.
🥛 I give you something yummy to drink.

animal.question: I hop around and eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat crunchy vegetables.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I can spray water with my nose.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and run fast. What am I?
I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I love to eat leaves from the highest branches.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🐾 I am a cat, but much bigger!
